story_parts.text: A lion was walking through the jungle when he came across a city. He had never seen a city before and was curious to explore it. He walked through the streets, looking at all the buildings and people. He even saw a few other lions and went up to them to say hello. After a while, the lion got tired and decided to go back to the jungle. He had a lot of fun exploring the city and would definitely come back again.
next_options: The lion continues to explore the city and eventually finds a place to rest
The lion gets scared by all the people and runs back to the jungle
story_parts.selected_option: The lion continues to explore the city and eventually finds a place to rest

story_parts.text: The lion continues to explore the city and eventually finds a place to rest. He enjoys the sights and sounds of the city and would definitely come back again.
next_options: The lion continues to explore the city and eventually finds a place to rest
The lion gets tired of exploring the city and decides to go back to the zoo
